content.raw: Looks good. However, the major issue is that when the user switches into viewpoint control by pressing the left spacenav button, both the viewpoint and the arm respond to spacenav messages. That can be fixed in a later pull request, but it should definitely be addressed (especially if we advertise Spacenav viewpoint control as a feature).
content.html: Looks good. However, the major issue is that when the user switches into viewpoint control by pressing the left spacenav button, both the viewpoint and the arm respond to spacenav messages. That can be fixed in a later pull request, but it should definitely be addressed (especially if we advertise Spacenav viewpoint control as a feature).
